page.title: 18Friday Folk Club
page.content: { Friday Folk}is a{club}for{children of 10 and over,{run by the Vicar}and two lady helpers.It is held in the Church rooms{every Friday}evening. We play many{games}like Cat and Mouse and Wink Murder. For 15 pence we can have a drink of orange squash and a chocolate bar. At Christmas,Easter and Harvest time we do{plays}to show what is special about each occasion.Sometimes we go on {day trips}to Minehead,Exeter or the Quantock Hills. One time we held a{'Cider and {Sausage' party}and made up a special Friday Folk Treasure Hunt for it.On a map of the 5 churches the Vicar looks after, you had to mark where you thought the treasure had been hidden. The treasure was 4 of the new one pound coins but I didn't find it!
